Name: King Battle
About the game: R & D team effort for several years, focusing on the show the beauty of fighting! Even strokes, floating, block, dizziness, tyrants body, crushing fighting spirit! Focus on multiplayer! • super cool sense of combat, fast-paced game. • A variety of competitive modes, multiplayer team, field fighting, Union push tower. • rich heroes, skills, equipment and so on. • A variety of dynamic equipment, fighting with random. Free choice of perspective. • Live dynamic lighting. • More innovative gameplay, each with a different experience.
